verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <WH7992> Now it came to pass on the third וַתִּלְבַּ֤שׁ <WH3847> put on אֶסְתֵּר֙ <WH635> that Esther מַלְכ֔וּת <WH4438> [her] royal וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֞ד <WH5975> [apparel] and stood בַּחֲצַ֤ר <WH2691> court בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king's הַפְּנִימִ֔ית <WH6442> in the inner נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> over against בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וְ֠הַמֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> and the king יוֹשֵׁ֞ב <WH3427> sat עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֤א <WH3678> throne מַלְכוּתוֹ֙ <WH4438> upon his royal בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמַּלְכ֔וּת <WH4438> in the royal נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> over against פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> the gate הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כִרְא֨וֹת <WH7200> saw הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And it was so when the king אֶת־ <WH853> אֶסְתֵּ֣ר <WH635> Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֗ה <WH4436> the queen עֹמֶ֙דֶת֙ <WH5975> standing בֶּֽחָצֵ֔ר <WH2691> in the court נָשְׂאָ֥ה <WH5375> [that] she obtained חֵ֖ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his sight וַיּ֨וֹשֶׁט <WH3447> held out הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king לְאֶסְתֵּ֗ר <WH635> to Esther אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁרְבִ֤יט <WH8275> sceptre הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> the golden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> that [was] in his hand וַתִּקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> drew near אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <WH635> So Esther וַתִּגַּ֖ע <WH5060> and touched בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> the top הַשַּׁרְבִֽיט׃ <WH8275> of the sceptre ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said לָהּ֙ הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מַה־ <WH4100> to her What לָּ֖ךְ אֶסְתֵּ֣ר <WH635> Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֑ה <WH4436> unto her What wilt thou queen וּמַה־ <WH4100> to her What בַּקָּשָׁתֵ֛ךְ <WH1246> request עַד־ <WH5704> against חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> thee to the half הַמַּלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom וְיִנָּ֥תֵֽן <WH5414> shall be given לָֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <WH635> And Esther אִם־ <WH518> If עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king ט֑וֹב <WH2895> If [it seem] good יָב֨וֹא <WH935> come הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> let the king וְהָמָן֙ <WH2001> and Haman הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> unto the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> that I have prepared לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king מַהֲרוּ֙ <WH4116> to make haste אֶת־ <WH853> הָמָ֔ן <WH2001> Cause Haman לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> that he may do אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> hath said אֶסְתֵּ֑ר <WH635> as Esther וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> So the king וְהָמָ֔ן <WH2001> and Haman אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> to the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6213> had prepared אֶסְתֵּֽר׃ <WH635> that Esther

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לְאֶסְתֵּר֙ <WH635> unto Esther בְּמִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <WH4960> at the banquet הַיַּ֔יִן <WH3196> of wine מַה־ <WH4100> What שְּׁאֵלָתֵ֖ךְ <WH7596> is your petition וְיִנָּ֣תֵֽן <WH5414> shall be granted לָ֑ךְ וּמַה־ <WH4100> and what בַּקָּשָׁתֵ֛ךְ <WH1246> request עַד־ <WH5704> against חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> to half הַמַּלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom וְתֵעָֽשׂ׃ <WH6213> it shall be performed
וַתַּ֥עַן <WH6030> Then answered אֶסְתֵּ֖ר <WH635> Esther וַתֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said שְׁאֵלָתִ֖י <WH7596> My petition וּבַקָּשָׁתִֽי׃ <WH1246> and my request

אִם־ <WH518> if מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> If I have found חֵ֜ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וְאִם־ <WH518> and if עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king ט֔וֹב <WH2895> and if it please לָתֵת֙ <WH5414> to grant אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵ֣לָתִ֔י <WH7596> my petition וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> and to perform אֶת־ <WH853> בַּקָּשָׁתִ֑י <WH1246> my request יָב֧וֹא <WH935> come הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> let the king וְהָמָ֗ן <WH2001> and Haman אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּה֙ <WH4960> to the banquet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> that I shall prepare לָהֶ֔ם וּמָחָ֥ר <WH4279> to morrow אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> for them and I will do כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> hath said הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> as the king

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> forth הָמָן֙ <WH2001> Haman בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he שָׂמֵ֖חַ <WH8056> joyful וְט֣וֹב <WH2896> and with a glad לֵ֑ב <WH3820> heart וְכִרְאוֹת֩ <WH7200> saw הָמָ֨ן <WH2001> but when Haman אֶֽת־ <WH853> מָרְדֳּכַ֜י <WH4782> Mordecai בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> in the king's וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not קָם֙ <WH6965> that he stood not up וְלֹא־ <WH3808> or זָ֣ע <WH2111> nor moved מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> before וַיִּמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> was full הָמָ֛ן <WH2001> for him he עַֽל־ <WH5921> against מָרְדֳּכַ֖י <WH4782> against Mordecai חֵמָֽה׃ <WH2534> of indignation

וַיִּתְאַפַּ֣ק <WH662> refrained הָמָ֔ן <WH2001> Nevertheless Haman וַיָּב֖וֹא <WH935> himself and when he came אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> home וַיִּשְׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> he sent וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> and called אֶת־ <WH853> אֹהֲבָ֖יו <WH157> for his friends וְאֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֥רֶשׁ <WH2238> and Zeresh אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH802> his wife

וַיְסַפֵּ֨ר <WH5608> told לָהֶ֥ם <WH1992> Then הָמָ֛ן <WH2001> And Haman אֶת־ <WH853> כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> them of the glory עָשְׁר֖וֹ <WH6239> of his riches וְרֹ֣ב <WH7230> and the multitude בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> of his children וְאֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> where גִּדְּל֤וֹ <WH1431> had promoted הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> and all [the things] wherein the king וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and how נִשְּׂא֔וֹ <WH5375> him and how he had advanced עַל־ <WH5921> above הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> him above the princes וְעַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> and servants הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said הָמָן֒ <WH2001> Haman אַ֣ף <WH637> also לֹא־ <WH3808> no הֵבִיאָה֩ <WH935> did let no man come in אֶסְתֵּ֨ר <WH635> moreover Yea Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֧ה <WH4436> the queen עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> with the king אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֥ה <WH4960> unto the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖תָה <WH6213> that she had prepared כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אוֹתִ֑י <WH853> וְגַם־ <WH1571> also לְמָחָ֛ר <WH4279> but myself and to morrow אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am קָֽרוּא־ <WH7121> am I invited לָ֖הּ עִם־ <WH5973> her with הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> unto her also with the king

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֕ה <WH2088> of this אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> does not שֹׁוֶ֖ה <WH7737> Yet all this availeth לִ֑י בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֗ת <WH6256> me nothing so long as אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I רֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> I see אֶת־ <WH853> מָרְדֳּכַ֣י <WH4782> Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֔י <WH3064> the Jew יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> sitting בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> gate הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> at the king's

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said לוֹ֩ זֶ֨רֶשׁ <WH2238> Zeresh אִשְׁתּ֜וֹ <WH802> his wife וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֹֽהֲבָ֗יו <WH157> and all his friends יַֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> be made עֵץ֮ <WH6086> unto him Let a gallows גָּבֹ֣הַּ <WH1364> high חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> of fifty אַמָּה֒ <WH520> cubits וּבַבֹּ֣קֶר ׀ <WH1242> and to morrow אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> speak לַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> thou unto the king וְיִתְל֤וּ <WH8518> may be hanged אֶֽת־ <WH853> מָרְדֳּכַי֙ <WH4782> that Mordecai עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> on וּבֹֽא־ <WH935> thereon then go עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> with the king אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> unto the banquet שָׂמֵ֑חַ <WH8056> thou in merrily וַיִּיטַ֧ב <WH3190> pleased הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> And the thing לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> accept הָמָ֖ן <WH2001> Haman וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> to be made הָעֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> the gallows פ
